description: A collection of circles in a tall rectangular formation with a rounded top and bottom with a small trapezoidal formation extending downwards from the bottom; there is also a vertical almond-shaped formation with a concave top conjoined to the right side of the rectangular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a reddish-orange triangle in the center of the rectangular formation and a beige triangle in the center of the almond-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
